title: Luis Viera

title: Doug Wedel
subtitle:
Road Fatalities By "Transport Mode."

It measures transport deaths by counting victims.
How will that possibly get to the cause?

What if we measured refugee crises by counting refugees?
Oh. We do that. And the refugee problems never end. pic.twitter.com/ZYRAMoWSgJ
